reviewText: I had seen "Breaking the Rules" way back when I was in High School.  I thought it was great then.  The other on here, well, when he's out there with a band I was worried, but then the comedy kicked in and all was good.  I've never laughed this hard.  Sam on CD is WAAAAAY different than Sam live.  Sam on CD is good, but this is even better.  With Sam, it's better when you have the visual.  Sit back and laugh.
Title: Sam Kinison: Unleashed!

reviewText: This dvd is kick ass! If you like Sam kinison you will love this dvd! It is packed with extra footage. I would tell everyone to pick this up baby!
Title: Sam Kinison: Unleashed!

reviewText: I picked this up yesterday and took it home putting it into the player as soon as I walked in the door. I ended up watching it 3 times in one day. I laughed so hard. I am 38 and remember his performances from late-night tv and seeing these 2 performances on DVD was so cathartic. I laughed until I cried sometimes. There are outtakes that people have said the sound faded but that's why they were outtakes. If you listen, you will still get the jokes even though they sound fades in and out. Mic's in those days were not as good as today. You can't blame Sam for the equipment.
Title: Sam Kinison: Unleashed!

reviewText: sam kinison was a wild man.  always enjoyed his sense of humor.  this video is a very good example.
Title: Sam Kinison: Unleashed!

reviewText: If you are one of the two polarities of political thought in comtempory America, a.k.a. as liberal and conservative; then you will probably be offended by much of this man's comedic genius.
Title: Sam Kinison: Unleashed!
